items.title: Static converters
items.text: Static converters for converting electrical energy; includes AC/DC adapters and USB chargers per WCO notes. Typical retail USB phone chargers fall here when not combined with radio transmit/receive functions.

items.title: Parts of electrical transformers, static converters and inductors
items.text: Parts suitable for use solely or principally with the apparatus of heading 8504. Use only when the product is a part, not a complete charger.
